reviews.customers_say: Customers like the sweater's style, with one mentioning it can be dressed up, and appreciate its vibrant colors.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Zaful Ladies Crop Sweater
items.body: Great ladies/teen crop sweater, perfect for winter. The sweater is high quality and nice weight for keeping you warm in cold weather. The sweater can be dressed up or down for a casual look. Relaxed fit and soft Read more
items.author: D Irwin

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute, cropped, and warm!
items.body: I love this cropped sweater! It’s perfect for colder weather and pairs beautifully with dresses and jumpsuits. I liked it so much that I bought it twice—once in brown and again in black! The fit is great and the material feels much higher quality than I expected. It’s definitely cropped—the hem hits around the belly button—but the high neckline offers good coverage, and the lantern sleeves add an adorable touch. Overall, it’s stylish, cozy, and surprisingly well-made! Read more
items.author: Peggy

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars good staple
items.body: I've worn this sweater a few times and found it to be a nice, thick, and good-quality piece. It's not very itchy, which is a plus. I've worn it with both skirts and jeans, and it looks great with either! Unfortunately, there isn't a tag, so it's a little tricky to determine the front and back. Read more
items.author: TrackNTackleMama

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Wide Neck but Not Enough to Roll
items.body: I got this in a Medium. It was slightly cropped on me, so it may be a great full length sweater for someone a bit shorter than I am. The sleeves were long which is something that NEVER happens. The fall pumpkin pattern was cute. It’s not the softest sweater I have ever put on (I live in sweaters in the mainly cold northern climate I live in) but I think it would last. What made me return this is the neck. I love turtlenecks but this felt bulky and wasn’t a full turtleneck, so I could roll it. It hung wide so it looked a little floppy and there were some seams in the neck, which may have been why it felt bulky. Read more
items.author: Anon

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect Velma Sweater and Cute for Everyday Wear
items.body: I bought this sweater to use for a Velma Halloween costume, and it worked perfectly. The fit is really cute, and it also works well for casual wear beyond the costume. Nice style and a fun, versatile piece to have. Read more
items.author: Brittany Duhn

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Runs small!!
items.body: Runs very small. XL fits like a sm/med. I wear a typical large in sweaters and wanted a looser fit in this cropped sweater so I sized up to the XL. It was way too small, looked more like a half shirt (came to about the middle of my stomach, When i raised my arms you can see under boob) rather than a cropped (cropped usually means right at the waist or a bit higher than the waist) I’m 5’8 145-150lb Other than it running really small, it was soft, not really see through and seems to be of good quality. Read more
items.author: Brande Woolems

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute
items.body: Cute sweater, looks just like the photo, I am petite and this length is perfect for high rise jeans . Looks cute , not to heavey of a knit, turtleneck is mock like. I love it , however , I thought it was a bit pricey. Brown is a hard color to find . So I'm keeping it. Read more
items.author: Kz

items.title: 2.0 out of 5 stars Not worth it
items.body: Looks and feels like a lightweight, cheap sweater. Color is warm red, not true or cool red. Read more
items.author: jwmom

short_description:
Womens Dress is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.
about_this_item:

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

long_description:
Womens Dress is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: One Size.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: 1-xmas Red, 2-apricot, 2-chestnut Red, 1-apricot, 1-khaki, 2-green, 1-slate Blue, 1-deep Coffee, 1-tan, 1-brick Red, 1-pumpkin, 2-purple, 1-army Green, 2-tan. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
